CustomField.formula: CASE( RecordType.Name, "Private Equity - Industrials", TEXT(RE_Industrials__c), "Private Equity - TMT", TEXT(Reason_Eliminated__c), "Real Estate Equity", TEXT(Reason_Eliminated_RE__c), "Health Care Growth", TEXT(Reason_Passed__c), "Health Care PE/Core", TEXT(Reason_Passed__c), "Europe", TEXT(Eliminated_ReasonEU__c), "Strategic Growth", TEXT(Reason_Eliminated__c), "NGT - Asia", TEXT(RE_Asia__c), "Private Equity - Asia", TEXT(RE_Asia__c), "Private Equity - CRG", TEXT(Reason_Eliminated__c), "Global Impact", TEXT(Eliminated_ReasonEU__c), "Infrastructure", RE_Infra__c, "Private Equity", TEXT(Reason_Eliminated_FIG__c), "Real Estate Credit - Direct Lending", IF(TEXT(KKR_Bid__c)="No", TEXT(Reason_REC__c), TEXT(RL1__c) & ", " & TEXT(RL2__c) & ", " & TEXT(RL3__c)), "Real Estate Credit - Securities", IF(TEXT(KKR_Bid__c)="No", TEXT(Reason_REC__c), TEXT(RL1__c) & ", " & TEXT(RL2__c) & ", " & TEXT(RL3__c)), "Real Estate Credit - Shadow", TEXT(Reason_REC__c), "Energy", TEXT(RE_Energy__c), null )
CustomField.label: Reason Eliminated - Common
